body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our Car Dealership customer service. My name is Aaron Turner, how may I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Rose Miller.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rose. Can you please provide me with your contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it is three zero five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Could you also share your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Rose. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling confused about the recent billing statement I received.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Rose. Let's review the details together. Thank you for reaching out and sharing your concerns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Rose. Feel free to contact us if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
